author: Anthony Zell
text: I've been tasked with creating a job description for an assistant City Administrator position, and was wondering if anyone would be willing to share theirs with me.  I understand that some positions are crafted to meet the needs of the municipality, but I am also curious how those functions are grouped.  Any help or assistance is greatly appreciated.
